0.1.name: wordpress/carquery-api
0.1.description: The CarQuery API plugin uses simple short codes to add dependent vehicle year, make, mode, and trim dropdowns in your post or page. The vehicle dropdown menus use AJAX requests to auto-populate using the CarQuery API from http://www.carqueryapi.com
